page.title: 01Montrose, Hillside Area.
page.content: Our block has three main areas. The first is a large{modern housing estate to the north of Montrose locally known as Borrowfield. This is where our school is situated.To the east of this there is a recently developed {industrial estate}made up of mainly oil related industries. The second main area in our block is the{village of Hillside.The main feature of the village is Sunnyside Royal Hospital which has been in existance for more than two hundred years.Sunnyside is a psychiatric hospital and employs many people of Hillside and Montrose.The third main area of our study will deal with the many aspects of{farming}and farms which are dotted to the west and south west of Hillside.Our block is mainly a rural area feeling the effect of{North Sea {Oil}and related industries.
